text: Hagi Amoni vahe'mo'zane, Hanuni'enema ke'za antahi'za hazama zamagrama haza avu'avamo'ma Devitima azeri arimpama nehegeno'a, karisifima mani'neza zamaza hu'za Devitima ha'ma hunte'naza vahetamine karisiraminema mizasenazana Messopotamia kumateti'ene, Aram-ma'aka kumateti'ene, Zoba kumatetira, kna'amo'a 30 tausen hu'nea silva zagoreti ome mizase'naze.
